original: intros. intros H1 H2. unfold no_msg_from_to, consume_msg. intros H3 H4 j tms b H5. unfold find, upd, mark_msg. destruct (find j s) eqn:E1. - specialize (H3 j tms b). intros H6 H7. apply H3. + rewrite E1. reflexivity. + auto. - reflexivity.
